verses.verse: My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7370>overflows<s%> with a <S%H2896>noble<s%> <S%H1697>theme.<s%> I <S%H559>recite<s%> my <S%H4639>verses<s%> for the <S%H4428>king.<s%> My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is like the <S%H5842>pen<s%> of a <S%H4106>skillful<s%> <S%H5608>writer.<s%>

You are the most <S%H3302>excellent<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%> <S%H2580>Grace<s%> has <S%H3332>anointed<s%> your <S%H8193>lips,<s%> therefore <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
<S%H2296>Strap<s%> your <S%H2719>sword<s%> on your <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1935>one:<s%> your splendor and your <S%H1926>majesty.<s%>

In your <S%H1926>majesty<s%> <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H6743>victoriously<s%> on <S%H1697>behalf<s%> of <S%H571>truth,<s%> <S%H6037>humility,<s%> and <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> Let your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H3384>display<s%> awesome <S%H3372>deeds.<s%>
Your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp.<s%> The <S%H5971>nations<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> under <S%H3820>you,<s%> with arrows in the heart of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
Your <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> is <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%> A <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of <S%H4334>equity<s%> is the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>

You have <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%> Therefore <S%H430>God,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> has <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you with the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>gladness<s%> above your <S%H2270>fellows.<s%>

All your <S%H899>garments<s%> smell like <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> <S%H174>aloes,<s%> and <S%H7102>cassia.<s%> Out of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1964>palaces<s%> <S%H4482>stringed<s%> instruments have made you <S%H8055>glad.<s%>

<S%H4428>Kings<s%>' <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are among your honorable <S%H3368>women.<s%> At your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> the <S%H7694>queen<s%> <S%H5324>stands<s%> in <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H7200>consider,<s%> and <S%H5186>turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear.<s%> <S%H7911>Forget<s%> your own <S%H5971>people,<s%> and also your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H183>desire<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> <S%H7812>honor<s%> <S%H113>him,<s%> for he is your lord.
The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> comes with a <S%H4503>gift.<s%> The <S%H6223>rich<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2470>entreat<s%> your <S%H6440>favor.<s%>

She shall be <S%H2986>led<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> in embroidered <S%H7553>work.<s%> The <S%H1330>virgins,<s%> her <S%H7464>companions<s%> who <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H935>her,<s%> shall be brought to you.
With <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>rejoicing<s%> they shall be <S%H2986>led.<s%> They shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1964>palace.<s%>
Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will take the place of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%> You shall <S%H7896>make<s%> them <S%H8269>princes<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will make your <S%H8034>name<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> in <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> Therefore the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall give you <S%H3034>thanks<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
